CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

1. "Polymer" is a material name in the paragraph.
2. "donor and / or acceptor materials" are also material names in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Polymer
2. donor materials
3. acceptor materials

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer |
| donor materials |
| acceptor materials |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

1. "Power conversion efficiency" is a property name in the paragraph. It refers to the efficiency of a device to convert one form of energy into another form of energy, in this case, converting sunlight into electricity in polymer solar cells.
2. "Donor" and "acceptor materials" are also property names in the paragraph. They refer to the materials used in the construction of the polymer solar cells, which play a crucial role in the efficiency of the device.
3. "Device engineering" is a property name in the paragraph. It refers to the design and optimization of the polymer solar cell device to improve its performance.
4. "Fabrication processes" is a property name in the paragraph. It refers to the methods and techniques used to manufacture and assemble the polymer solar cell device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Power conversion efficiency
2. Donor materials
3. Acceptor materials

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Power conversion efficiency |
| Donor materials |
| Acceptor materials |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

1. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)

The "Property Value" entity in the given paragraph is "power conversion efficiency (PCE)". It is a property of polymer solar cells (PSCs) that indicates the efficiency of converting light energy into electrical energy. The value of PCE exceeding 10% is mentioned as a significant achievement in the development of PSCs.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Power conversion efficiency (PCE) of 10% or more

I have removed the irrelevant entities and kept only the "Property Value" entity that clearly refers to the value of a material property. In this case, it is the power conversion efficiency (PCE) of 10% or more, which is a key performance indicator of polymer solar cells (PSCs).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| power conversion efficiency (PCE) exceeding 10% |
